title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in it taking focus.
EB: Clicking on the first Combo should result in it taking focus.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. 
2. Press 'Tab' and confirm that the focus goes to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
